actions.committee: Senate Committee on Banking, Housing and Urban Affairs
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Banking, Housing and Urban Affairs.

committees.committee: Senate Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs

official_title: A bill to authorize the issuance of twenty-five dollar gold pieces bearing the seal or symbol of the American Revolution Bicentennial Commission.

summary.text: Authorizes the issuance of $25 gold pieces bearing the seal or symbol of the American Revolution Bicentennial Commission. Provides that such $25 gold pieces shall be legal tender for all debts, public and private, public changes, taxes, duties, and dues.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the issuance of twenty-five dollar gold pieces bearing the seal or symbol of the American Revolution Bicentennial Commission.
